summary: DRIVER'S SIDE DOOR HINGE HAS FAILED.  DOOR DOES NOT CLOSE PROPERLY.  SINCE DOOR HAS "FALLED" AND IS NOT ALIGNED, THE OPENING ACTION HAS CRUMPLED THE FRONT QUARTERPANEL, PAINT IS NOW FLAWED. NOW A REPAINT AND BODY WORK IS NEEDED. HAVE NOTICED OTHER LEBARONS WITH THIS SAME TELL-TALE DAMAGE; THIS IS EVIDENTLY A DESIGN DEFECT.  I UNDERSTAND THAT JEEP PRODUCTS SUFFER FROM THIS FLAW ALSO.
